author: m.kalinin
content: Is anybody leading efforts on the merge specification? What is the roadmap of the spec?

author: djrtwo
content:
I'm working on a general writeup on more concretely what the relationship between and eth2 and eth1 client would be in a merge
From there, I expect we debate this, iron out the detail a bit more, and drive on spec.

Phase 1 and Stateless Ethereum specs/implementations are most of the hard work (in my estimation). The additional components in the eth2 spec to stitch them together will be relatively minimal
